JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking a Product Reliability Specialist to join the Product Reliability Specialist team. The Product Reliability Specialist team leads operational programs to improve the performance, reliability, and efficiency (PRE) of the family of apps, with a specific focus on regression management. As a Product Reliability Specialist, your role will be to manage the design, implementation, and delivery of programs, rapidly evolving capabilities, driving operationalization, identifying candidates for automation, and leveraging qualitative and quantitative data to develop and inform cross-functional roadmaps. You'll also manage projects by collaborating with and influencing cross-functional teams throughout the company, including product and engineering, to grow the impact of your team and improve user
